title: 04/09/21 DPS Hour 1 Mike Tirico
itunes:title: 04/09/21 DPS Hour 1 Mike Tirico
description:
Mike Tirico talks to Dan about the Masters. Mike says that replay needs to add common sense in MLB, the NBA and the NFL.
